dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3406671X] technographx ILLEGAL
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. technographx ILLEGAL Added by system at Friday, Mar 9 2007 07:54 am X-MailFrom: admin@tribolis.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Mar 9 07:54:06 2007 Received: (qmail 11218 invoked by alias); 9 Mar 2007 13:54:06 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 11215 invoked from network); 9 Mar 2007 13:54:06 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 9 Mar 2007 13:54:06 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 9 Mar 2007 07:54:06 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 09 Mar 2007 07:54:06 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from admin@tribolis.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HPfXp-0002jA-Vl; Fri, 09 Mar 2007 07:54:06 -0600 Received: from host.tribolis.com ([72.232.200.122]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from admin@tribolis.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HPfXk-000HIU-U5; Fri, 09 Mar 2007 07:54:01 -0600 Received: from 124-168-122-249.dyn.iinet.net.au ([124.168.122.249] helo=[127.0.0.1]) by host.tribolis.com with esmtp (Exim 4.63) (envelope-from ) id 1HPfXf-0004WT-Jb; Fri, 09 Mar 2007 22:53:56 +0900 Message-ID: <45F166E9.3010502@tribolis.com> Date: Fri, 09 Mar 2007 22:53:45 +0900 From: Jennifer Yen User-Agent: Thunderbird 1.5.0.10 (Windows/20070221) MIME-Version: 1.0 To: serversales@theplanet.com, abuse@theplanet.com Subject: technographx ILLEGAL Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="------------080709050600080709030505" X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - host.tribolis.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - tribolis.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: X-OriginalArrivalTime: 09 Mar 2007 13:54:06.0288 (UTC) FILETIME=[6746C500:01C76252] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) To whom it may concern It has come to my attention that material displayed on a site hosted by your company, http://www.technographx.com is a direct copyright violation of material protected by copyright laws, owned by JENNIFER YEN / WWW.TRIBOLIS.COM . The material in question was from: ORIGINAL: www.tribolis.com www.tribolis.com/about.php www.tribolis.com/terms.php www.tribolis.com/aup.php RIPPED: www.technographx.com www.technographx.com/aup.php www.technographx.com/tos.php www.technographx.com/about.php which the copyright, nor source material was never released for public, corporate, or personal use. I hired the writer to write content in www.tribolis.com/about.php www.tribolis.com/terms.php www.tribolis.com/aup.php eg. Tribolis: "Web hosting solutions are convenient for designers, developers, web agencies, corporations, small/medium businesses and other business groups. " technographx.com: "Web hosting solutions are convenient for designers, developers, web agencies, corporations, small/medium businesses and other business groups. " *And more* as I provided the link. technographx.com stole our content without permission and modified, the footer and front page with 3 columns / 'Read more' link are very similar to our site. I know it is inspired but I do not want their is IDENTICAL to ours at Tribolis. RIPPED: I feel it is unfair that they used our content which I PAID for writers to write. It was not cheap to hire writers. I am asking you take technographx.com site DOWN! I cannot find who are they host with, in DNS look up showed ThePlanet / Please point me who is technographx.com hosted on so I can speak to their main hosting to review and take the site down. Please find my disclaimer in terms.php *DISCLAIMER* THIS SITE IS PROVIDED BY TRIBOLIS ON AN "AS IS" BASIS. TRIBOLIS MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, AS TO THE OPERATION OF THE SITE, THE INFORMATION, CONTENT, MATERIALS OR PRODUCTS INCLUDED ON THIS SITE. TO THE FULL EXTENT PERMISSIBLE BY APPLICABLE LAW, TRIBOLIS DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES, EXPRESS AND IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES OR MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. TRIBOLIS WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES OF ANY KIND ARISING FROM THE USE OF THIS SITE OR THE PRODUCTS PURCHASED USING THE SITE, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE AND CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES. After further review of your TOS, this is a direct infraction of the TOS agreement and is intentional. I have provided sufficient proof of where the violations have occurred. Since this is clearly a violation of your TOS agreement, I would ask that you kindly remove the material in question and/or suspend the account to prohibit further display of the material in question. Thank you for your time and assistance in this matter. -- Regards, *TRIBOLIS :* Web Hosting Solutions - Jennifer L Yen Founder and CEO ** www.tribolis.com | ** This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential and intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom they are addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify the system manager. Please note that any views or opinions presented in this email are solely those of the author and do not necessarily represent those of the company. Finally, the recipient should check this email and any attachments for the presence of viruses. The company accepts no liability for any damage caused by any virus transmitted by this email. MIME element (text/html) To whom it may concern

It has come to my attention that material displayed on a site hosted by your company, http://www.technographx.com is a direct copyright violation of material protected by copyright laws, owned by JENNIFER YEN / WWW.TRIBOLIS.COM . The material in question was from:

ORIGINAL:
www.tribolis.com
www.tribolis.com/about.php< br> www.tribolis.com/terms.php< br> www.tribolis.com/aup.php

RIPPED:
www.technographx.com
www.technographx.com/aup.php< /a>
www.technographx.com/tos.php< /a>
www.technographx.com/about. php

which the copyright, nor source material was never released for public, corporate, or personal use.

I hired the writer to write content in www.tribolis.com/about.php www.tribolis.com/terms.php www.tribolis.com/aup.php

eg.
Tribolis: "Web hosting solutions are convenient for designers, developers, web agencies, corporations, small/medium businesses and other business groups. "
technographx.com: "Web hosting solutions are convenient for designers, developers, web agencies, corporations, small/medium businesses and other business groups. "
And more as I provided the link.

technographx.com stole our content without permission and modified, the footer and front page with 3 columns / 'Read more' link are very similar to our site. I know it is inspired but I do not want their is IDENTICAL to ours at Tribolis.
RIPPED:

I feel it is unfair that they used our content which I PAID for writers to write. It was not cheap to hire writers.

I am asking you take technographx.com site DOWN! I cannot find who are they host with, in DNS look up showed ThePlanet / Please point me who is technographx.com hosted on so I can speak to their main hosting to review and take the site down.

Please find my disclaimer in terms.php

          DISCLAIMER
          THIS SITE IS PROVIDED BY TRIBOLIS ON AN "AS IS" BASIS. TRIBOLIS
          MAKES NO REPRESENTATIONS OR WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR
          IMPLIED, AS TO THE OPERATION OF THE SITE, THE INFORMATION, CONTENT,
          MATERIALS OR PRODUCTS INCLUDED ON THIS SITE. TO THE FULL EXTENT
          PERMISSIBLE BY APPLICABLE LAW, TRIBOLIS DISCLAIMS ALL WARRANTIES,
          EXPRESS AND IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO IMPLIED WARRANTIES
          OR MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE. TRIBOLIS
          WILL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGES OF ANY KIND ARISING FROM THE USE OF
          THIS SITE OR THE PRODUCTS PURCHASED USING THE SITE, INCLUDING BUT NOT
          LIMITED TO DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, PUNITIVE AND CONSEQUENTIAL
          DAMAGES.

After further review of your TOS, this is a direct infraction of the TOS agreement and is intentional.  I have provided sufficient proof of where the violations have occurred. Since this is clearly a violation of your TOS agreement, I would ask that you kindly remove the material in question and/or suspend the account to prohibit further display of the material in question.

Thank you for your time and assistance in this matter.
--

Regards,

TRIBOLIS : Web Hosting Solutions - Jennifer L Yen
Founder and CEO
